mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user (user_account, user_name, user_pwd, user_avatar, user_email, user_role, is_login, is_word, create_time) VALUES (#{userAccount}, #{userName}, #{userPwd}, #{userAvatar}, #{userEmail}, #{userRole}, #{isLogin}, #{isWord}, #{createTime})
mapper.update:
UPDATE user
user_account = #{userAccount},
user_name = #{userName},
user_pwd = #{userPwd},
user_avatar = #{userAvatar},
user_email = #{userEmail},
signature = #{signature},
is_login = #{isLogin},
is_word = #{isWord},
user_role = #{userRole},
WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.delete:

#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT u.user_name AS userName, u.user_avatar AS userAvatar, u.signature AS signature, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM interaction i1 WHERE u.id = i1.user_id AND i1.type = 3) AS viewCount, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM interaction i2 WHERE u.id = i2.user_id AND i2.type = 1) AS upvoteCount, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM interaction i3 WHERE u.id = i3.user_id AND i3.type = 2) AS saveCount FROM user u WHERE u.id = #{userId}
